key_features: Earn 8% cashback globally on your 5 preferred cashback categories
Up to 8% cashback in local and overseas restaurant dining and Online Food Delivery (e.g. Foodpanda and Deliveroo)
Up to 8% cashback on petrol and passenger transportation services such as contactless bus and train rides, taxi, private hire rides (e.g. SimplyGO, Grab rides, ComfortDelGro etc.)
Up to 8% cashback on online local and overseas groceries (e.g. Redmart, FairPrice Online)
Up to 8% cashback on data communication & online TV streaming
Earn 8% cashback on all Malaysian Ringgit and Indonesian Rupiah spend on top of your 5 preferred cashback categories
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
3 years annual fee waived; spend min. S$12,000 per year to get subsequent waiver
Be empowered with the choice of card design that best represents you! Select your preferred card design from the 3 designs offered by Maybank!
overseas_spending: Up to 8% cashback on your 5 preferred cashback categories
Earn up to 8% cashback on all Malaysian Ringgit and Indonesian Rupiah spend
Exclusive Regional Treats, from dining to shopping, spanning across Malaysia, Indonesia, Cambodia & Philippines
petrol: Earn up to 26.45% at all Caltex Petrol Stations in Singapore with Diamond Sky Fuel Card
Up to 8% cashback on all petrol stations globally
Up to 8% cashback for your EV car charging
cash_back: Earn up to 8% cashback globally on your 5 preferred cashback categories
Earn up to 8% cashback on all Malaysian Ringgit and Indonesian Rupiah spend
Up to 8% cashback on groceries, dining, transport and petrol spend in Singapore and Malaysia
Up to 8% cashback on shopping, data communication & online TV streaming
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
rewards: Earn up to 26.45% at all Caltex Petrol Stations in Singapore with Diamond Sky Fuel Card
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
entertainment: Up to 8% cashback at Data Communication & Online TV Streaming merchants in Singapore
Up to 8% cashback at bars, drinking places, cinemas and live concert or play
Online TV Streaming merchants includes Netflix, Spotify and/or other pay television, cable and radio services in Singapore
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
grocery: Up to 8% cashback at all supermakets (including online grocery stores) in Singapore & Malaysia
Cashback for groceries including offline and online merchants
Merchants include Income Fairprice/Finest/X-tra, Cold Storage, Market Place, Jasons, Giant, Sheng Siong, RedMart, Honestbee and all other groceries stores and supermarkets in Singapore and Malaysia
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
dining: Up to 8% cashback in local and overseas restaurant dining
Up to 8% cashback for Fast Food
Up to 8% cashback for Food Delivery
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend
online_shopping: Up to 8% cashback on local and overseas online fashion
shopping: Up to 8% cashback on selected merchants
Merchants include POPULAR Bookstores, Toys 'R' Us and Yamaha Music
Unlimited 0.3% cashback on all other spend

fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher
